message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7,500.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $7,500 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now.  I'm willing to pay $7,000. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $7,250.
